subject: Re: [OT] DELIVERY FAILURE: Delivery time expired
body:
Cc: list-owner(AT)perl.org

Tom Allison schreef:
> This is getting annoying....
>
> It might be useful if objectorb.com would actually provide some
> reason for delivery beyond "Delivery time expired".

There is no need to send this to the list, so to all of its many
subscribers. Send it to the list owner, see the headers of each list
message about how to reach her.

Yes, other people get these annoying "bounces" too, and I already asked
the list owner at least twice to do something about it (the best way
being to remove anyone related to objectorb.com from all Perl related
mailing lists).

If more people would do that, let's hope that the list owner will act
upon it, at last.

-- 
Affijn, Ruud (administrator of many lists, but unfortunately not of this
list)

"Gewoon is een tijger."


-- 
To unsubscribe, e-mail: beginners-unsubscribe@perl.org
For additional commands, e-mail: beginners-help@perl.org
http://learn.perl.org/
